Class UmaEditorPlugin

java.lang.Object

org.eclipse.epf.uma.presentation.UmaEditorPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.emf.common.util.Logger, org.eclipse.emf.common.util.ResourceLocator
public final class UmaEditorPlugin
extends org.eclipse.emf.common.EMFPlugin
This is the central singleton for the Uma editor plugin.
